EmailTemplate.description: For some one asking if we have a trainer in their location
EmailTemplate.name: TrainerLocation
EmailTemplate.subject: Trainer in your location
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for reaching out. Currently, we know of X number trainers in location. Her/his name is ___. I cannot guarantee their availability at this time but I can give you their information.
IF atlas trainer, point to Atlas trainer page: https://www.atlasdog.org/find-a-trainer/
IF not yet Atlas trainer, or trainer we know and trust, give email
You can contact them at: email
They may also be able to point you in the direction of other trainers in your area if they are not available.
Let me know if you have any additional questions.
Best, {!User.FirstName}
